sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Layout from '../components/Layout/Layout'; import './Academics.css'; const Academics = () => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('programs'); // Sample data for academic programs const academicPrograms = [ { id: 1, title: "Elementary School", description: "Our elementary program focuses on foundational skills in literacy, numeracy, and social development.", grades: "Grades 1-5", features: ["Interactive Learning", "STEM Introduction", "Arts Integration"], color: "#4f9da6" }, { id: 2, title: "Middle School", description: "Our middle school curriculum challenges students with advanced coursework while supporting adolescent development.", grades: "Grades 6-8", features: ["Project-Based Learning", "Technology Integration", "Exploratory Courses"], color: "#ff8a5c" }, { id: 3, title: "High School", description: "Our comprehensive high school prepares students for college and career with diverse academic pathways.", grades: "Grades 9-12", features: ["AP Courses", "Career Technical Education", "College Counseling"], color: "#7b3c95" } ]; // Sample faculty data const facultyMembers = [ { id: 1, name: "Dr. Sarah Johnson", position: "Science Department Chair", education: "Ph.D. in Biology, Stanford University", experience: "15 years teaching experience", image: "https://via.placeholder.com/150" }, { id: 2, name: "Mr. David Chen", position: "Mathematics Instructor", education: "M.S. in Mathematics, MIT", experience: "12 years teaching experience", image: "https://via.placeholder.com/150" }, { id: 3, name: "Ms. Maria Rodriguez", position: "Humanities Department", education: "M.A. in Literature, University of Chicago", experience: "10 years teaching experience", image: "https://via.placeholder.com/150" } ]; // Sample curriculum data const curriculumData = [ { grade: "Elementary", focus: "Foundational Skills", subjects: ["Reading & Writing", "Mathematics", "Science", "Social Studies", "Arts", "Physical Education"] }, { grade: "Middle School", focus: "Exploratory Learning", subjects: ["English Language Arts", "Algebra", "Life Sciences", "World History", "Electives", "Health Education"] }, { grade: "High School", focus: "College & Career Preparation", subjects: ["Advanced Mathematics", "Laboratory Sciences", "Social Sciences", "World Languages", "AP Courses", "Career Technical Education"] } ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

{/* Programs Section */}

Our Academic Programs

We offer comprehensive educational pathways designed to nurture each student's potential

{academicPrograms.map(program => (

{program.title}

{program.grades}

{program.description}

    {program.features.map((feature, index) => (
  • {feature}
    • ))}
{/* Learn More */}
))}
{/* Curriculum Section */}

Our Curriculum

A rigorous, standards-based curriculum designed to challenge and inspire students

{curriculumData.map(item => ( ))}
{curriculumData.map(item => (

{item.grade} Curriculum Focus: {item.focus}

{item.subjects.map((subject, index) => (
{subject}
))}
))}
{/* Faculty Section */}

Our Distinguished Faculty

Meet our dedicated educators who are committed to student success

{facultyMembers.map(member => (

{member.name}

{member.position}

{member.education}

{member.experience}

))}
{/* Achievements Section */}

Academic Achievements

Graduation Rate

{/* Resources Section */}

Academic Resources

Library Services

College Counseling

Learn More
); }; export default Academics;
